title: 141. On-Demand Homemade Food Delivery Platform | Woodspoon
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Oren Saar, the co-founder and chief executive officer of WoodSpoon, and Kevin Martinez, a chef at Jean Georges. Barron, Saar, and Martinez explore a new survival strategy for chefs nationwide amidst the ongoing pandemic.
